body:
Reading the [contribution guide](https://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/contribution_guide.html#style-tests), I'm trying to style check my package before submitting a PR, but `spack style` fails with the error

```
% spack style
Error: style is not a recognized Spack command or extension command

% spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-200-e117e087e
* **Python:** 3.8.2
* **Platform:** darwin-catalina-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original
```
title: `spack style` is not a recognized command
